state.description: Translation success or failure is indicated by a value of 1 (success) and 0 (failure).

error_message.description: Translation error message (only present when state is 0, the value is null when state is 1).

translate_result.description: Translation result object (only present when state is 1, the value is null when state is 0).

form.description: The format of the content to be translated

content.description: The translation results of the sentence (only present when form is sentence, the value is null when form is word).

content_with_parts_of_speech.description: Word translation with part-of-speech tagging: Each element corresponds to a part-of-speech tag and the translation corresponding to that part of speech (only present when form is word, the value is null when form is sentence).

word_class.description: Part of speech of the word to be translated

content.description: The translation of the word of the current part of speech should include at least two translations separated by a semicolon.
